ability.BiomeBlessingSwamp.description: When the Pokémon enters a swamp biome, its Special Attack and Attack are increased by 5% and Speed by 15%. If it's a Ghost-type Pokémon listed in the config, its Special Attack and Attack are increased by 10% and Speed by 15%, then further increases Attack and Special Attack by 20% for a total of 30%.
ability.DragonRise.description: When the Pokémon enters the field, if it is Dragon-type, its Special Attack, Attack, and Speed are boosted for 3 turns. The boosts increase each turn.
ability.ElectricDivinity.description: Electric-type Pokémon gain 20% Attack, 25% Special Attack, and 5% Speed upon entering battle, and reduce damage from super effective moves by 5%.
ability.FastStartReforged.description: For the first 3 rounds after the Pokémon enters the field, its attack and speed increase by 50%, and the effect ends after 3 rounds.
ability.FightingDivinity.description: Greatly boosts the power of Fighting-type moves. If the Pokémon is Fighting-type, its Special Attack and Attack damage are increased by 10% when it enters the field.
%s's Biome Blessing: Swamp activated! Special Attack and Attack increased by 5%, Speed by 15%.
%s's Biome Blessing: Swamp activated! As a blessed Ghost-type, its Special Attack and Attack increased by 10%, Speed by 15%, and then total Attack and Special Attack increased by 30%.
pixelmon.abilities.dragon_rise.boost: %s's Dragon Rise: Special Attack +%d%%, Attack +%d%%, Speed +%d%% (Turn %d)
pixelmon.abilities.dragon_rise.dragon_as: %s's Dragon Ascent is empowered by Dragon Rise!
pixelmon.abilities.electric_divinity.red: %s's Electric Divinity reduced the power of %s!
pixelmon.abilities.fast_start.activate: %s has entered the Fast Start state! Speed and attack have been greatly increased!
pixelmon.abilities.fast_start.end: The Fast Start effect of %s has ended! Speed and attack have returned to normal.
rem.furnace.tag.description: Construction guides for high-efficiency smelting setups
rem.furnace.tag.title: Super Furnaces
rem.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_1: Super Blast Furnace: A special structure for highly efficient ore smelting
rem.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_3: Layer 2: Surround the blast furnace with iron blocks
rem.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_4: Place a blast furnace in the center
rem.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_5: Layer 3: 3x3 block of iron top cover
rem.ponder.super_blast_furnace.text_6: Compared to a regular blast furnace, the Super Blast Furnace is far more efficient
rem.ponder.super_furnace.text_1: Super Furnace: A special structure that greatly improves smelting efficiency
rem.ponder.super_furnace.text_3: Build Layer 2: Note the center position
rem.ponder.super_furnace.text_4: Place a furnace in the center
rem.ponder.super_furnace.text_6: Done! The Super Furnace significantly boosts smelting speed
rem.ponder.super_smoker.text_1: Super Smoker: A special structure for quickly smoking food
rem.ponder.super_smoker.text_2: Layer 1: Alternate coal blocks and logs in a cross pattern
rem.ponder.super_smoker.text_3: Layer 2: Keep the cross pattern, place a smoker in the center
rem.ponder.super_smoker.text_4: Place a smoker in the center
rem.ponder.super_smoker.text_6: Done! The Super Smoker greatly increases food smoking speed
